ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] 24 Pet spell help
ygData.msgSnippet: Something that worked for me was to make a mule character in cities of races that don t have Necro s and where Necro s are KoS and use the mule to check
ygData.messageBody:
Something that worked for me was to make a mule character in cities of races
that don't have Necro's and where Necro's are KoS and use the mule to check
merchants. The closer the city is to a 24+ hunting ground the better.
Kelethin and Felwithe would be good places to look. I have even found many
good words in Oggok and Grobb.

Orcen
Cazic-Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: Jon Blevins [mailto:jdblevins@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 11, 2000 10:38 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] 24 Pet spell help


Anyone know of a good place to get Words for the lvl
24 pet research? I have been saving ALL my words since
lvl 15ish and have NEVER even seen 2 of the 3 Words I
need, and only have one of the other words. At lvl 23
on the Nameless I am getting a little nervous about my
24 pet spell.

Xiven the Nervous
